column5: The following video is a brief excerpt from our latest adventure on Lake Ontario. This trip was focused on targeting rainbows on June 27.  Hope you enjoy!  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NwyzyOWZTGs
you boys have the editing down perfect....timeline for the camera angles couldnt get any better ....nice shooting on the bows but totally awesome on the videos....  Cheers!
